comments:
Started eclipse.
Turned autobuild off.
File->Import
Select the PDE importer
Select org.eclipse.compare and all prerequisites.
Ok. The operation appeared to complete, and then got the following exception.

This is a dup. For now, just deselect Binary Projects decorator from Windows-
>Decorators. There is a missing icon in the 'basic' icon set that is causing 
this and you are obviously running in the 'basic' mode.
